file_content.text: Now, normally, the Empire's research bases are crawling with soldiers like dekk flies on dung.
But today they're grabbing every warm body to retake Sobrik and Camp Vigil. There'll never be a better time to strike.
I completely had that in mind when I came to get you.
I planned that.
I love a woman who thinks ahead.
It was a finely choreographed dance.
I love it when you talk dirty.
[Flirt] Ooh, tell me more.
My description of armed troop emplacement fortifications will make you swoon.
But seriously, it's mostly droids on the base now. And it's all coordinated from just a few command posts.
I'm on my way.
We're thinking frontal assault?
So just head right in?
They're leaving mostly droid defenses at the base, which are coordinated from a few different command posts.
If you can plant slicer-spikes into the terminals at all the posts, it should open all the internal doors, leave you just the droids to get past.
Droids always seem to like me.
I'm good with droids.
I wouldn't count on these droids having much personality. They're heavy war droids, a Balmorra speciality.
Good luck, Captain.
Why bother with all that when I could just sneak in?
Is that really necessary?
I wouldn't risk it. Balmorra's the birthplace of the Mark-37 combat droid. Building newer, deadlier models is a charming local tradition.
Hit the command stations; there's no bonus for making things harder on yourself.
No time like the present.
Onward and upward, then.
And if you get that shipment... keep the resistance in mind, okay? We could use a few of those weapons.
Captain! I don't know who you got to rig Camp Vigil, but that place is gonna burn for weeks!
We've been checking Imperial communications--they're going crazy!
It's the first time they've been seriously scared we could win. They're talking about bringing back the Voidwolf to contain us!
The Voidwolf, eh? Not the most popular guy at parties....
Is that a good thing?
Yeah, I don't know what we'd do if he came, but it sure feels good to hear those bullies crying for papa.
I guess the delousing wasn't too traumatic?
You sound pretty cheerful.
I'm not saying it was fun in there, but I will never forget watching that place go up in flames.
Gives a whole new meaning to "hot date."
[Flirt] Glad to help.
Such a "fiery" woman!
Isn't there some munitions shipment that's going to destroy us all if we don't stop it?
Oh. So, I had a chance to go through the files you got from Golden, and I've got great news.
Sixer said you're the only one who can decode where I go next.
Have you looked at the files?
Yes, yes, don't worry. I've gotten through Golden's files, and there's great news.
He's acquired the access codes for the research base where the Nebula shipment is being stored.
Let me guess, the most heavily defended spot on all of Balmorra?
Where is it?
Not today, sweetheart. That's what makes this so beautiful.
Normally, sure.
Most days, you couldn't walk two meters without hitting a patrol.
Isn't "Golden" really some Imperial Moff?
I don't trust "Golden."
Moff Tyrak. The SIS are still congratulating themselves on getting a mole that high.
Give them over.
I'm transmitting the codes now.
It's Malak Memorial Research Base. I'll send the coordinates.
